title: IGIVIT Phase2: Beyond the Prototype
description: Giving to charities should be a transparent process, with the general public empowered to see exactly how their donations are being used.
solution: With IGIVIT, it will be easy to give to and manage charity campaigns while keeping track of every single donation
experience: We are a combination of an experienced Data Engineer/PM/Plutus Pioneer and a visionary individual imagining how to improve philanthropy.
